verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jehovah Jireh, won't You come and give us life?
Jehovah Rophe, won't You come and heal us now?
He will breathe and restore the weary heart.
He will restore our souls. He will restore our souls!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ay Yah, Ay Yah. Ay Yah, Ay Ay Ay Yah! (2X)
He will restore their souls. He will restore their souls!
